Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory463.jpg'}
{2: 'Mechanical Dog', 3: 'Woof woof woof woof, woof woof woof!'}
{1: '1', 2: 'No. 21', 3: '【kuroname】 is having a birthday today. I have to be here.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: '【kuroname】, final inspection.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'No. 21 lies on the ground, holding a crudely made remote control that operates a racing mechanical dog.'}

{3: 'Vera only just mentioned last week that No. 21 was studying mechanical structures—and here she is today, in Gray Raven\'s lounge with a homemade mechanical dog, asking you to have a look at this "surprise."'}
{3: 'Except the mechanical dog isn\'t fully calibrated yet, which makes this... the 32nd "final inspection" you\'re going through with No. 21.'}
{2: 'The floor is cold. Do you need this blanket?', 3: '11'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'It smells like 【kuroname】. I like it. I want it.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'No. 21 takes the blanket and stuffs it under her soft belly.'}
{2: "I don't think that's how it's meant to be used...", 3: '15'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: "Doesn't matter. Focus. This is the 32nd inspection.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Under No. 21's urging, you sit beside the mechanical dog reluctantly and hold up your terminal to record its running patterns."}
{3: "Running shouldn't be a complicated task... but this mechanical dog has three heads, each with its own mind."}
{2: 'Mechanical Dog', 3: 'Awoo awoo, awooo!'}
{3: 'The mechanical dog starts howling like a wolf and dashes off as soon as No. 21 presses the button. A few steps in, its left head takes control, causing it to veer off course.'}
{2: 'Mechanical Dog', 3: 'Woof woof woof woof, woof woof woof!'}
{2: 'There is this head that howls like a wolf, and there is this other one that barks like a dog...'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: "That's just diversification in design.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'Watch and learn, 【kuroname】.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Sensing a competition when the left head barks, the right head suddenly pulls to the right and bursts out laughing.'}
{2: 'Mechanical Dog', 3: 'Hee-hahahaha! Hahaha!'}
{3: 'Eventually, all three heads start yelling all at once as they run in a chaotic manner.'}
{2: '(Sweat nervously.)', 3: '29', 4: "That's quite an innovative design.", 5: '29'}
{3: "Something hits you as strange right when you're about to stop the malfunctioning dog."}
{3: 'The three heads start spinning faster and faster, stirring the air around them... before they begin to hover.'}
{2: "...It's taking off, and you can't even begin to describe how bizarre the sight is!", 3: '32'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'Three-headed Helicopter Dog—No. 21, two months of research! Huge success!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: '【kuroname】, are you confused?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'As if to prove something, No. 21 grabs the remote and presses a red button.'}
{2: 'Flying Mechanical Dog', 3: 'BOOM!'}
{3: "A storage compartment suddenly pops out of the flying mechanical dog's belly and confetti of all sorts of colors rains down, some of which make their way into your shirt."}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'Planned, innovative, making 【kuroname】 astounded!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: "This is No. 21's birthday surprise for you. I know I'm rocking it like a star.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Where did you even learn to say that...', 3: '41'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'Candy wrappers, need to be unwrapped.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Under No. 21's watchful eyes, you produce two pieces of confetti from my collar and find scrawled writing on them."}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'It took me quite some time.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Both pieces have smiley faces drawn on them, with "Eat well every day" and "Sleep well every day" written on them.'}
{3: 'Another piece that landed on your shoulder reads "Run into No. 21 all the time".'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'No. 21 came to keep you company. I was worried that 【kuroname】 might feel lonely.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'As she speaks over the noise from the flying three-headed mechanical dog, No. 21 opens her arms at you.'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'I want to give you a hug. You can touch my hair. You can touch my ears, too... but only today.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'As long as 【kuroname】 smiles, No. 21 smiles, too.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'If 【kuroname】 feels happy, No. 21 feels happy, too.', 4: '1'}
